# Vendors

## Grafana API token

<details>
<summary>Pattern Format</summary>
<p>

```regex
eyJrIjoi(?i)[a-z0-9-_=]{42}
```

**Comments / Notes:**

- Current Version: v0.1
</p>
</details>



## SendGrid (deprecated)

<details>
<summary>Pattern Format</summary>
<p>

```regex
SG\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]*\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]*
```

**Comments / Notes:**

- Current Version: v0.1
- Deprecated (supported by Secret Scanning)
</p>
</details>
